Reviews.Title: Not what I expected.
Reviews.Author: K9Luvr
Reviews.Content: The instructions were absolutely useless, even my IT guy at work said it sounded like a 1st grader wrote it.  Also, there isn't a "flashing" light but there is a light so it's not discrete.  I tried it once and you can't hear anything that's more than 2 or 3 feet away from the device.  When I called customer service the connection kept cutting out so I had to send an email.  The company did say that I could return it and that they wouldn't charge me the restocking fee.  I haven't checked my statement yet to see if I received a refund.  Unless you want the device to speak directly into it yourself, I wouldn't recommend it.
